4 Tips to deal w/ volatility:

1: Mentally cut your portfolio in half now. Would your life change? If so, adjust your asset allocation. Hold more cash.

2: Know the odds. 
10% ⬇️ every ~11 months
20% ⬇️ ~48 months
30% ⬇️ ~120 months 
40% ⬇️ ~360 months 
Big drops are normal!

3: ALL great stocks take huge hits:
$BRK.B -48% 2009

$AMZN -94% 2001
$AAPL -80% 1998

Expect it!
